channel.title: Yingbo Ma's homepage
channel.description: I put my random thoughts here.

item.title: Posts
item.description: A short description of the page which would serve as blurb in a RSS feed; you can use basic markdown here but the whole description string must be a single line (not a multiline string). Like this one for instance. Keep in mind that styling is minimal in RSS so for instance don't expect maths or fancy styling to work; images should be ok though:

item.title: A Strange but Effective Debugging Technique in Julia
item.description: This post introduces a strange but effective debugging technique in Julia involving global variables.

item.title: A Complete Derivation of Quasi-constant Step Size BDF Method
item.description: We will do a complete derivation of all the formulas necessary for implementing a complete quasi-constant step size backward differentiation formulas method.

item.title: A Survey of Differential-Algebraic Equations (1)
item.description: We will introduce characterizations, numerical treatments, and structural analysis/transformation algorithms of differential-algebraic equations in this post.

item.title: Taylor Series, Fourier Series, and Cauchy's Integral Formula
item.description: Using integration to compute high order derivatives of analytical functions.

item.title: Having Fun with an Integral
item.description: Using Cauchy's Integral Formula and Taylor Series to calculate a fun integral
